# NSControl.ControlSize.regular

**Case**

The default control size.

## Declaration

```swift
case regular
```

## Sizing Controls

- **NSControl.ControlSize.mini**: The smallest control size.
- **NSControl.ControlSize.small**: A size smaller than the default control size.
- **NSControl.ControlSize.large**: A size larger than the default control size.

items.description: A size smaller than the default control size.
items.name: NSControl.ControlSize.small

items.description: A size larger than the default control size.
items.name: NSControl.ControlSize.large

title: NSControl.ControlSize.regular
